name: Alien Infestation (Warblingpants67)
description:
Alien Infestation is a game made in three hours for the TriJam #123 Game Jam. It's a simple top-down shooter, with the twist that alien's blood is acid. After killing an alien hide, or get caught in a shower of acid.

Please let me know of any recommendations for new features, or of any bugs you find :)

Edit: I have now added an updated version with slightly more features (download only). This version resembles more  what I hoped to make within the limit. When judging the game, please do not use the updated version :)

Resources used:

  • Unity Game Engine
  • Aseprite
  • https://sfxr.me/
  • https://www.dafont.com/
  • https://freemusicarchive.org/music/BoxCat_Games#contact-artist
